revised_title: The Attraction of the Himalaya Mountains and Elevated Regions on the Plumb-Line in India
tldr: John Henry Pratt investigates the gravitational attraction of the Himalaya Mountains and elevated regions on the plumb-line in India. He develops a mathematical formula to calculate the deflection of the plumb-line and determines that the mass of the Doubtful Region is greater than that of the Known Region. The findings have implications for understanding the Earth's gravitational field and the behavior of the plumb-line in various locations.
